segments.text: Hello , Grace . That's a beautiful skirt you have on . Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to attend an interview .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of job are you applying for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My major is English . Of course I'll apply for an English teacher .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . That dress doesn't exactly match the job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why ? You said my skirt was beautiful just now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , your skirt is really beautiful , but you are applying for a teaching position . You see , your skirt is very short , and your make up is too thick . What's more , the color of your lipstick doesn't match your skin . As a teacher , you should be a little more sedate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some of my friends tell me that being a teacher , the most important is the beauty of mind . You shouldn't pay too much attention to your appearance . You should appear frugal and prudent . Your experience and knowledge will gain the appreciation of your interviewer .
segments.speaker: S1
